entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 8.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 8:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa steady
Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 60 percent chance of showers with risk of a thunderstorm. Widespread smoke. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:53 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 6:53 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
